Hello {!Lead.Name},
The purpose of my email is to introduce you to ACV, if you are not already familiar, and see if you have a few minutes to chat about our services so we can share the value we provide to our customers on a daily basis.
ACV Enviro is a fully integrated environmental services and waste management organization with offices throughout the Northeast and Midwest. We own and operate permitted part B treatment, disposal, and recycling facilities; supported by an extensive line of remediation, waste disposal/recycling, transportation, industrial cleaning, emergency response and field services. Our combined locations enhance our ability to respond to your needs 24/7, and deliver great, safe service, which you should expect. Please let me know a day and time that works best for you.
Check out our website www.acvenviro.com
